Question
========

Select ALL methods that can be used to fill in the missing data:

Answerlist
----------

*  Linear interpolation of the seasonal component of the STL decomposition 
*  Filling in with the conditional mathematical expectation using Kalman filter 
*  Fill in missing values with previous value 
*  Random number drawn from Cauchy distribution 

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

*  False. Linear interpolation of the deseasonalized component of the STL decomposition + a seasonal component
*  True.
*  True. 
*  False.
